quotes.quote: One of the advantages of being disorderly is that one is constantly making exciting discoveries.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: A discovery is said to be an accident meeting a prepared mind.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: One doesn't discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The more original a discovery, the more obvious it seems afterwards.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: There is a theory which states that if ever anybody discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' (I found it!) but 'That's funny ...'
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: I do not know what I may appear to the world; but to myself I seem to have been only like a boy playing on the seashore, and diverting myself in now and then finding a smoother pebble or a prettier shell than ordinary, whilst the great ocean of truth lay all undiscovered before me.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: If I have ever made any valuable discoveries, it has been owing more to patient attention, than to any other talent.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: There is no harm in doubt and skepticism, for it is through these that new discoveries are made.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.quote: He who never made a mistake never made a discovery.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles
